conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

[TALK] Thank you for checking in, and we confirm we have your details on file (immediate start/no constraints, high schedule flexibility, quick response/acceptance).

At this stage, there isn’t any further essential information we need from you to be able to issue an offer on short notice. If you would like to ensure everything is fully “offer-ready,” the only additional items that can be helpful (if available) are:
- Proof of age/ID documentation you would use for enrollment (you can simply confirm you have it available)
- Any funding/fee arrangement you intend to use (if applicable), or confirmation you will self-fund initially until any arrangements are finalized
- Emergency contact details (a second contact person/number)

On timing: we’re not able to commit to a decision date within the next week or two, as the remaining place is still being held while we continue to assess options in line with our allocation priorities. If we are able to proceed with an offer to your family, we will contact you immediately.

If you reply confirming (1) you have the necessary ID/age documents available and (2) your preferred fee/funding approach, we will mark your file as fully ready to proceed.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions

conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

[TALK] Thank you for your update and for keeping everything fully offer-ready.

On your questions: we’re not able to share internal deadlines or specific review points for the remaining place, and there isn’t a single procedural “trigger” we can point to beyond concluding our priority review and confirming the place can be released.

In terms of making things instantaneous: you have already completed all meaningful pre-steps (forms, documents, funding/payment readiness). We do not pre-authorize payments before an offer/invoice is issued.

If you would like us to move to a final decision immediately, please send a fresh formal message marked [APPLY] confirming:
1) you will take the place as offered (including any days pattern),
2) earliest start date remains next business day, and
3) you will pay the deposit upon receipt of the invoice.

Once we receive that [APPLY], we can respond promptly.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions

Next steps (so we can finalize today):
